T03TD3812E:1b-1: bha ga ba ti pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta na wa shloo ka pinda aartha /
T03TD3812E:1b-3: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad [dd] pa dgu pa /
T03TD3812E:1b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03TD3812E:1b-5: shes rab pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho ste //
T03TD3812E:1b-6: dge ba rin chen 'byung gnas rang nyid yin //
T03TD3812E:1b-7: pha rol phyin pa dag ni thams cad kyang//
T03TD3812E:1b-8: de ru de yi bdag nyid dag gis gnas //
T03TD3812E:1b-9: spros pa med cing snang ba med //
T03TD3812E:1b-10: rnam rtog med cing skyon dang bral //
T03TD3812E:1b-11: rang bzhin med mchog shin tu phra //
T03TD3812E:1b-12: thig le sgra ni rnam par spangs //
T03TD3812E:1b-13: shes rab pha rol phyin yum ni //
T03TD3812E:1b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i mchog / rjes su mi dmigs gsum gyi tshul //
T03TD3812E:1b-15: thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul gyi //
T03TD3812E:1b-16: shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni //
T03TD3812E:1b-17: gang zhig yang dag bsgom 'dod pas //
T03TD3812E:1b-18: des ni tshigs bcad dgu pa'i don //
T03TD3812E:1b-19: mdor bsdus pa ni bsam par bya //
T03TD3812E:1b-20: las kyi mthu las byung ba yi //
T03TD3812E:1b-21: skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid can //
T03TD3812E:2a-1: srid zhes byar grags pa yin //
T03TD3812E:2a-2: de ni mig yor dag dang mtshungs //
T03TD3812E:2a-3: ji ltar sprul pa'i grong khyer la //
T03TD3812E:2a-4: sprul pa rnam par lta ba bzhin //
T03TD3812E:2a-5: las rnams kyis sprul 'gro ba yis //
T03TD3812E:2a-6: gzugs rnams de bzhin mthong bar 'gyur //
T03TD3812E:2a-7: chos rnams ston pa'i sgra dang ni //
T03TD3812E:2a-8: thos pa'i spyod pa gang ci 'ang rung //
T03TD3812E:2a-9: mnyan bya thos pa byung gyur pa //
T03TD3812E:2a-10: thams cad brag ca lta bu yin //
T03TD3812E:2a-11: yul la chags pas snom pa dang//
T03TD3812E:2a-12: myang dang de bzhin reg pa rnams //
T03TD3812E:2a-13: dmigs su yod pa ma yin te /
T03TD3812E:2a-16: bya ba tha dad byed pa ltar //
T03TD3812E:2a-18: de bzhin bya ba byed par 'gyur //
T03TD3812E:2a-19: dmigs pa sna tshogs gang dang gang //
T03TD3812E:2a-21: mthong na 'jig cing mtshan nyid bral //
T03TD3812E:2a-22: 'di ni smig rgyu dag dang mtshungs //
T03TD3812E:2a-23: gzung bya gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T03TD3812E:2a-24: thog ma med pa'i sems las byung //
T03TD3812E:2a-25: rnam par shes pa'ang de 'dra ste //
T03TD3812E:2a-26: phan tshun gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs //
T03TD3812E:2a-27: bsgom pa dang ba'i rgyud la ni //
T03TD3812E:2a-28: ye shes zla ba gang byung ba //
T03TD3812E:2b-0: mngon sum yod pa ma @2b yin te //
T03TD3812E:2b-1: de ni chu zla dag dang mtshungs //
T03TD3812E:2b-2: rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes gang //
T03TD3812E:2b-3: de yang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T03TD3812E:2b-4: de bas shes dang shes bya dag / thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //
T03TD3812E:2b-5: de ltar de bzhin nyid sems pa //
T03TD3812E:2b-6: dngos po kun la mi gnas te ;
T03TD3812E:2b-7: byang chub smon pa'i sems kyis ni //
T03TD3812E:2b-9: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa /
T03TD3812E:2b-10: slob dpon chen po ka ma pa la'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T03TD3812E:2b-12: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a ts'arya shraddh'a ka ra warma dang /
T03TD3812E:2b-13: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
